com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities.environment

Class HttpWebClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities.environment.HttpWebClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WebClient

    public class HttpWebClient
extends Object
implements WebClient
    An HTTP web client implementation. It supports two methods: "GET" and "POST".

    • Method Detail

      • createRequest

        public Request createRequest(String method,
                    String url)
                      throws AluminumException
        Description copied from interface: WebClient
        Creates a request for a certain resource. After the request is created, it can be further configured; no interaction with the server takes place until the request is actually sent.
        Specified by:
        createRequest in interface WebClient
        Parameters:
        method - the request method to use
        url - the URL of the resource to request
        Returns:
        the new request
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the request can't be created
